fullForm: Indian Council of Medical Research Junior Research Fellowship
conductingBody: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER), Chandigarh on behalf of Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR)
eligibility: Indian nationals with an MSc/MA or equivalent degree with at least 55% marks for General/OBC and 50% for SC/ST/PH candidates, in the subjects mentioned in the notification. Final year/result awaiting candidates are also eligible.
coursesLinked: PhD and Research programs in medical colleges, hospitals, universities, national laboratories, and institutions of higher learning and research

faqs.question: When is the ICMR JRF entrance examination usually held?
faqs.answer: The entrance examination is usually held once a year in the first or second week of July, on a Sunday. The examination notice is published in leading English newspapers and on the official websites of ICMR and PGIMER, Chandigarh.
